articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: Wolff: F1 figures should live up to role model status amid Horner investigation - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Mercedes Formula 1 team principal Toto Wolff says those involved in the series should live up to role model status in response to the Christian Horner investigation.
articles.content: Red Bull's Austrian parent company instigated an investigation into team boss Horner after allegations of inappropriate behaviour were made by a female employee, which led to him being interviewed by… [+1823 chars]
